item.title: A Gene Editing Therapy Cut Cholesterol Levels by Half
item.description: An experimental gene-editing therapy developed by Crispr Therapeutics is showing promise for treating heart disease.

item.title: Trump’s Hatred of EVs Is Making Gas Cars More Expensive
item.description: Trump’s anti-climate agenda is making it more expensive to own a car, period.

item.title: Gear News of the Week: Fairphone Lands in the US, and WhatsApp Is Finally on the Apple Watch
item.description: Plus: Motorola has new Moto G phones, Canon’s R6 III mirrorless has a 32-MP sensor, and Teenage Engineering’s Riddim n’ Ting looks gorgeous.

item.title: The 42 Best Movies on Netflix, WIRED’s Picks (November 2025)
item.description: Frankenstein, The Twits, and The Running Man are just a few of the movies you should watch on Netflix this month.

item.title: The 42 Best Shows on Netflix, WIRED's Picks (November 2025)
item.description: The Witcher, Boots, and House of Guinness are just a few of the shows you need to watch on Netflix this month.
